statements: DELETE FROM customer_segmentation_analysis WHERE segment_category = 'High Value';
DELETE FROM customer_segmentation_analysis WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM customer_segmentation_analysis WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_segmentation_analysis WHERE segment_category = 'Premium') AND age < 40;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 201 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount < 1000 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 1000 AND category = 'Electronics';
